channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 23:38 Drive alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.
item.description: 🟢 23:38 Drive alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.#Sumy_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 23:33 Drawing anxiety in the Kharkiv region.
